ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, both are off the undead knight, someone said that he does harm touch, which isnt true, but on occasion he will get a pet summoned, which dies easy.  i ve
ygData.messageBody:
yes, both are off the undead knight, someone said that he does harm touch,
which isnt true, but on occasion he will get a pet summoned, which dies
easy. i've been camping this room alot lately, and you need a mid 20's
group i'd say, healer type is nice. make sure the room downstairs is also
camped (bar room), or you will get all those spawns too (they attack
through the floor). if you have to take care of both tower room and bar
room, its hectic, but a mid 20 group can do it as long as there are 2
healer types, druid and cleric is good, and a burner makes things go
smoother.

the mantle is dropped every time, the tunic is a very rare drop, i would
say 1 in 10 is a fair ratio, and he the knight spawns every 1-1.5 hour i
think, never really noticed.

Omnibus LightStorm
Level 27 Paladin, E'ci

On Wed, 1 Sep 1999, Whitcraft,David wrote:

> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Bloodstained Mantle and Bloostained Tunic, both off the Undead Knight in
> Unrest? If so, what level party you need (I have heard prolly around 26-30?)
> to take him down? And how rare are the drops off him?
>
> Also, Polished Bone Hoops, same info needed. Level, zone, mob...etc...
>
> Thanks!
